import React from 'react' import MainLayout from '../layouts/MainLayout' import { useAuth } from '../components/AuthContext' import Container from '../components/Container' import { Paper, Typography, Button } from '@material-ui/core' import Router from 'next/router' import ProfileView from '../components/ProfileView' import withApollo from '../lib/with-apollo' import withAuth from '../lib/with-auth' function MyProfile() { const { currentUser } = useAuth() return ( {currentUser &&
{currentUser.fullName} {currentUser.email}
If there is a mistake in your name or if you want to update your email, please contact an administrator
{currentUser.profile ?
My Profile
:
You do not have a profile yet. Please contact an administrator
}
} ) } MyProfile.getInitialProps = () => ({ authRequired: true }) export default withApollo(withAuth(MyProfile))
